IONIAN SEA.
DNC 09.
M/V SANDY, 500 PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING ASSISTANCE
VICINITY 38-00N 017-00E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 39 065 924 44145, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793, E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
